headline: 2025 Sands Cares Global Food Kit Build Produces Nearly 50,000 Food and Meal Kits to Aid Hunger Relief
summary: NORTHAMPTON, MA / ACCESS Newswire / September 16, 2025 / Las Vegas Sands Las Vegas Sands From March through June, Sands Team Members and community volunteers participated in a series of global events that made up the fourth annual Sands Cares Global ...

headline: Does Recent Macau Visitor Surge Signal More Upside for Las Vegas Sands in 2025?
summary: Thinking about what to do with Las Vegas Sands stock? You are not alone. With the share price hovering around $53.09, plenty of investors are weighing whether the casino giant still has room to run, or if recent market trends mean it is simply time to cash in. Over the past year, the stock has jumped an impressive 34.7%, delivering strong long-term gains, while the last month or so has been a bit quieter, with minor dips of about -1.1% over 30 days and -1.2% in the last week. Even with these...
